stack.summary: Add CRM Entity Resolution category to LLM Data Extraction Pipeline

fields.what: Consolidate 6 ConnectWise/Rewst LLM prompts into a crm_entity_resolution category with 4 subsections (company_match, contact_match, ticket_match, taxonomy_classification)
fields.when: Proposal stage - OpenSpec change created, awaiting user approval
fields.why: Six independent LLM prompts with inconsistent matching behavior, no shared confidence scoring, duplicated candidate-set injection logic across Rewst workflows
fields.how: 1. Create OpenSpec proposal with design, spec deltas, and tasks 2. Implement category config node 3. Update input_validator, category_merger, build_prompt, output_assembler 4. Test against original prompt outcomes

fields.lest: Continued proliferation of bespoke LLM prompts per CRM workflow, inconsistent matching quality, no standardized confidence scoring for downstream thresholding
fields.with: OpenSpec spec-driven development, n8n-MCP partial workflow updates, Vitest local testing
fields.measuredBy: Company/contact/ticket/taxonomy matching produces equivalent or better results than the 6 source ConnectWise prompts on test transcripts, with standardized confidence scores and zero regression on existing 93 test cases
